abstract: The Dow gained more than 100 points within minutes of the central bank’s announcement and continued to climb before falling just before the close.
snippet: The Dow gained more than 100 points within minutes of the central bank’s announcement and continued to climb before falling just before the close.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street watched a Fed rally abruptly fizzle on Wednesday, as excitement over an interest rate cut gave way to concern about a new round of problems related to the subprime mortgage crisis.
